explains: adj. 受欢迎的，很吃香的

sentences.en: Spices were the most sought-after commodities.
sentences.cn: 香料是最受欢迎的商品。

sentences.en: The ability to work well with others and collaborate on projects is a sought-after ability in nearly every position.
sentences.cn: 几乎在每个职位上，与他人良好合作和协作项目的能力都是很受欢迎的能力。

sentences.en: An Olympic gold medal is the most sought-after prize in world sport.
sentences.cn: 奥运会金牌是世界体育活动中最受青睐的奖牌。
